name: Folgers Classic Roast Ground Coffee, Medium Roast Coffee, 25.9 Ounce Canister
short_description: Contains one (1) 25.9 ounce AromaSeal canister of Folgers Classic Roast ground coffee
Expertly roasted to make the most out of every bean
Rich, pure medium roast coffee in a special AromaSeal canister for freshness
The Best Part of Wakin’ Up in its most famous form
Store in a cool, dry place.
product_description: No matter what morning brings, you know you can count on the iconic red Folgers coffee canister for The Best Part of Wakin’ Up. Folgers Classic Roast ground coffee has been loved for generations for its famously fresh aroma and rich, smooth flavor. It’s the quintessential Folgers medium roast coffee — a timeless tradition that’s become a modern morning essential. A delicious highlight in even the most hectic mornings. And in its traditional ground coffee form, it’s versatile enough to use in a wide range of home coffee makers. Stock up now, and keep plenty on-hand to help make every day a little better.

product_description: This House Blend is the way we give honor to the art of blending coffee inspired by the Italian story of our founder, Luigi Lavazza. name: Starbucks Ground Coffee, Medium Roast Hot or Iced Coffee, Variety Pack, Three 12 oz Bags​
short_description: PREMIUM GROUND COFFEE: Enjoy the Starbucks coffee you love at home with three 12-ounce bags of Starbucks medium roast ground coffee​s—Starbucks Breakfast Blend, House Blend and Pike Place Roast
DELICATE BREAKFAST BLEND: Starbucks Breakfast Blend is an easy-drinking coffee, known for its light body and notes of brown sugar and sweet orange—making it approachable, smooth and oh, so delicious​

BALANCED HOUSE BLEND: Starbucks House Blend is a well-rounded and medium-bodied blend of Latin American coffees with notes of toffee and dusted cocoa—making it approachable, smooth and oh, so delicious​

BALANCED PIKE PLACE ROAST: Starbucks Pike Place Roast is a well-rounded and medium-bodied blend of Latin American coffees with subtly rich notes of cocoa and rich praline—making it approachable, smooth and oh so delicious​

HOT OR ICED COFFEE: Enjoy your coffee your way—brew it hot or over ice for a refreshing pick-me-up. Add your favorite coffee creamer for a personalized touch, or enjoy balanced, black coffee for a satisfying sip any time of day
BREW IT YOUR WAY: Enjoy the same delicious Starbucks taste, no matter how you make your cup—whether it’s a rich French press, classic drip brew or smooth pour-over
CAFÉ QUALITY: Starbucks adheres to the highest quality standards—shipping you the same artfully crafted Arabica coffee beans brewed in Starbucks cafés​
product_description: Explore three of our most popular medium roast coffees with this variety pack— Starbucks Breakfast Blend, Starbucks House Blend and Starbucks Pike Place Roast. This oh-so-delicious Starbucks coffee variety pack lets you find a roast that fits your mood and palate—Starbucks Breakfast Blend showcases notes of brown sugar and sweet orange; Starbucks House Blend has notes of toffee and dusted cocoa; and Starbucks Pike Place Roast has subtly rich notes of cocoa and rich praline. Discover a favorite with every sip. Nestlé uses Starbucks trademarks under license.​ © 2025 Starbucks Coffee Company. Pike Place is a registered trademark of The Pike Place Market PDA, used under license.

name: Illy Classico Ground Drip Coffee, Medium Roast, Classic Roast With Notes Of Chocolate & Caramel, 100% Arabica Coffee, No Preservatives, 8.8 Ounce (Pack Of 1)
short_description: ILLY DISTINCTIVE TASTE - Classico, medium roast flavored ground coffee has a lingering sweetness and delicate notes of caramel, orange blossom, and jasmine.

PREPARE DRIP COFFEE WITH EASE - Evoke a classic Italian beverage at any time. Coffee is to be freshly prepared and enjoyed immediately. Create the finest coffee experience in the comfort of your home.
THE FINEST GROUND COFFEE - We select only the 1% of the finest beans, thanks to a devoted collaboration with growers who place maximum importance on quality and sustainability.
WE BRING THE TASTE OF ITALY TO YOU - We’ve spent eight decades refining a singular, signature blend celebrated over the world as the pinnacle of what coffee can be.

SUSTAINABILITY IS OUR VISION - We pride ourselves on the constant focus on our environment and the community. We are part of a global movement with a common goal: to pave the way for a better, more liveable and more enlightened world.
product_description: The dream to offer the best coffee to the world, since 1933. Over the years, illy has perfected this process to obtain a coffee with a rich aromatic profile, balanced flavor and a one-of-a-kind aroma. To make our coffee, we select only the finest Arabica coffee plants, grown sustainably by our farmers in over 30 countries around the world. We cultivate long-lasting relationships with them based on shared values and personal growth. Because it is only by working together that we can achieve exceptional results. We select only the 1% of the finest Arabica coffee beans, thanks to many years of collaboration with growers who place maximum importance on quality and sustainability. Researching and experimenting with raw materials is a journey that never ends. After processing, the beans undergo a meticulous selection to ensure zero defects: even a single imperfect Arabica coffee bean can compromise the aroma of our blend. We preserve and enhance the aromas through our patented pressurized cans. Patented in 1934 by illy, pressurization is a preservation system in which the air in the tin is replaced by an inert gas at a pressure greater than that of the atmosphere. In this way, not only is the freshness of our coffee maintained, but its aroma is also enhanced. To obtain the best sustainable quality, illy sources the finest Arabica around the world, establishes a lasting relationship with the growers and nurtures a virtuous circle, generating well-being for consumers and socio-economic development for producers.

name: Kauai Coffee Ground Coffee – Smooth, Rich, Medium Roast – Light Floral Notes, Bright Aroma – Arabica Coffee, 10% Hawaiian with No Bitterness – Koloa Estate, 1 Pack of 10oz
short_description: TASTE OF PARADISE: Enjoy Kauai Coffee Koloa Estate’s light floral notes and bright aroma that bring the essence of Hawaii into your home, turning every morning coffee ritual into a serene island escape, capturing the spirit and charm of Hawaiian culture.

SMOOTH, NON-BITTER: Crafted with 10% Hawaiian-origin Arabica coffee beans, each cup promises a velvety smoothness devoid of bitterness. Enjoy the pure, vibrant notes of this ground coffee – a perfect match for anyone who loves their coffee deliciously mellow and sophisticated.

KAUAI COFFEE COMPANY ESTATE: Open year-round, Hawaii’s largest coffee estate offers immersive farm tours and tastings. Grown in rich volcanic soil and nurtured by Pacific breezes, Kauai Coffee delivers premium beans with bold flavor that reflects the island’s natural beauty.

GROUND COFFEE: Roasted to perfection and ground fresh, our coffee offers rich, complex flavor profiles. Experience the depth and variety in every cup, crafted for those who appreciate a truly exceptional brew. The perfect grind delivers versatility for drip, pour-over, or French press methods alike.

UNCOMPROMISING FRESHNESS & QUALITY: Count on the consistent freshness of Kauai Coffee, where every batch is carefully crafted to preserve its vibrant flavors and rich aroma. From the first scoop to the last sip, it’s the perfect choice for coffee lovers who expect an exceptional experience every day.
product_description: Discover the exquisitely rich blend of Kauai Hawaiian Ground Coffee, a unique offering that brings the authentic taste of paradise into your home. This flavored ground coffee combines 10% Hawaiian origin Arabica Coffee beans with the light floral notes and bright aroma of Koloa Estate, resulting in a smooth and satisfying brew that is free from bitterness. Grown on Hawaii’s largest coffee farm nestled in the fertile volcanic soil, these beans are nurtured under the Pacific sun and mountain rains, ensuring a premium Hawaiian coffee experience. This medium roast ground coffee captures the essence of a luxurious tropical environment, delivering a consistently smooth coffee with an easygoing character, ideal for any time of day. Each package offers convenience and freshness, ensuring that each cup of coffee brings you closer to Hawaii’s stunning landscapes. Incorporating the best elements of specialty coffee, our coffee not only serves as a delightful beverage but also makes for thoughtful Hawaiian gifts or additions to gourmet coffee gift sets. Transform your daily routine with the inviting aroma and taste of this premium ground coffee, and let every sip be a step into Hawaiian tranquility. Experience what this top-rated bag of coffee, inspired by the Hawaiian islands, has to offer.

name: Gevalia House Blend Medium Roast Ground Coffee (12 oz Bag)
short_description: GEVALIA COFFEE: One 12 oz bag of Gevalia House Blend Medium Roast Ground Coffee
MEDIUM ROAST COFFEE: Gevalia House Blend Medium Roast Ground Coffee provides the perfect care for the perfect cup
RELEASE THE AROMA: Our bag of House Blend medium roast ground coffee releases an aroma that will fill your home
OUR BEANS: Each bag is crafted from 100% Arabica coffee beans sourced from around the world
COFFEE THE SWEDISH WAY: All of our ground coffee bags use slow roasted, snap cooled beans to lock in flavor and aroma
KOSHER COFFEE: Every bag of medium roast ground coffee is great for those keeping Kosher
COMPATIBILITY: Gevalia ground coffee is compatible with all coffee makers
LOCK IN FRESH FLAVOR: Resealable bag of ground coffee with fresh lock tin tie retains flavor and aroma
HOUSE BLEND: Enjoy a smooth, balanced, medium roast with subtle hints of caramel and citrus
product_description: Gevalia House Blend Ground Coffee fills your mug with rich and never-bitter medium roast coffee. Gevalia beans are slow roasted, snap cooled to lock in flavor and aroma. We provide the perfect care for the perfect cup. Founded in Gavle, Sweden in 1853, Gevalia House Blend Ground Coffees are made from 100% Arabica beans sourced from around the world. Our full-flavored ground beans can be used in all coffee makers. Each 12-ounce bag of medium roast ground coffee is great for those keeping Kosher. Gevalia Ground Coffee’s fresh lock tin tie keeps in exquisite coffee taste until you’re ready to awaken your senses. Try Gevalia Ground Coffee and experience 150 years of Swedish tradition.

SUSTAINABLY SOURCED: Through packaging and environmentally-friendly practices we aim to eliminate waste and improve the wellbeing of coffee-growing communities
product_description: La Colombe Nizza is a medium roast blend that hits at the heart of sweet. It’s named for the city of Nice, France, hometown of our co-founder JP and home to some of the best honey in the world. True to its name, this coffee exemplifies a honey-sweet, roasted nuttiness. It’s one of our longstanding favorites, and the coffee we use for espresso in all La Colombe cafes.
